_sText:
A map made for people who want to play a minigame and are not so skilled, cause you cant have skils for this map. 

the main objective is to get to the bottom of the map where you can kill all the other players that were unlucky by shooting them or just pressing a button.

on each level you will need to choose between pieces of the platform. if you choose right your platform will break and you will fall on to the next platform. if you choose wrong you will end up in a knife area and must try to survive all waves of players that will come...

* the pieces wil break randomly every round!
